text: a quiet Saturday morning in the center
of Redding punctuated by a spectacular
accident by any reckoning Simon Smith
the local man on the receiving end of a
bus that comes from nowhere should be
seriously injured or worse yet he calmly
walks into a nearby bar the purpleturtle
is one of the best-known bars in the
town and it's CCTV captured the whole
thing it looks like the bus has gone out
of control it's just it's almost gone
into turbo it's just something sped up
doubled its speed if not more that's
absolutely shocking I just can't believe
that Simon got out dusted himself up and
walked away from it it's a miracle that
he's alive the scars have been Siddhant
too plain to see reading bus's says it
was an awful incident which is being
investigated internally Thames Valley
Police say no arrests have been made
Simon himself is nursing painful
injuries we called Simon a few hours
after that the day of the accident and
yet he was in a lot of pain he was yet
still in shock basically couldn't
believe what happened as you might
expect to shave this clothes has gone
viral the bar has been inundated with
requests from the media and people are
talking about it online most of them
simply admire the way Simon just kept
calm and carried on Ben Moore BBC news
